column1: premkalloe,Prem,Kalloe,Senior Finance Manager EMEA at Dolby International,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E03AQHTN-bG5Xt6Ew/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1530479420502?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=M11f6VC3fMVhLUhttWnP8i88U3SxvTpGN2VV9_rYjio,,personal,ACoAAACQsvIB1elcyOioxfYysRgTz37a8XI7uY4,9482994,,"More than 20 years of experience in finance, accounting and control areas within the Financial Services and Telecom industry. Experience with start-up companies, managing a team of professionals, IFRS, US & Dutch GAAP, M&A, change management and implementation & roll-out of ERP software (Oracle).

I am strong in building and structuring financial departments, a strong organizer, generalist with a helicopter view but keeping an eye on detail, result oriented, can easily communicate with different levels within the organization, and have strong analytical, decisive and pragmatic skills.
